data_table.description: EDIC. Patient status of participants with Type 1 diabetes and involved in the "Diabetes Control and Complications Trial (DCCT) and Epidemiology of Diabetes Interventions and Complications Study (EDIC)" project.

variable.name: FORM
variable.description: EDIC form number

variable.name: CLINIC
variable.description: A1. Identifying information. Deidentified EDIC clinic number

variable.name: EDICYEAR
variable.description: B2. Visit information: indicate which EDIC visit it was

variable.name: NAMHPE
variable.description: B3. Visit information: annual medical history and physical examination
variable.value: Annual medical history and physical examination

variable.name: NAOEVA
variable.description: B3. Visit information: endpoint visit, ophthalmic examination

variable.name: NAMNSI
variable.description: B3. Visit information: Michigan neuropathy screening instrument

variable.name: NAQOLIFE
variable.description: B3. Visit information: quality-of-life questionnaire

variable.name: NAHSQ
variable.description: B3. Visit information: health status questionnaire

variable.name: NAHCARE
variable.description: B3. Visit information: health-care delivery questionnaire

variable.name: NAHFOODF
variable.description: B3. Visit information: Harvard food frequency questionnaire

variable.name: NAEKG
variable.description: B3. Visit information: resting EKG/electrocardiogram list

variable.name: NACAROAU
variable.description: B3. Visit information: carotid artery ultrasound mailing list

variable.name: NALIPID
variable.description: B3. Visit information: lipid specimen mailing list

variable.name: NARENAL
variable.description: B3. Visit information: renal studies specimen mailing list

variable.name: NAGFR
variable.description: B3. Visit information: renal studies, GFR

variable.name: NAFUNDPH
variable.description: B3. Visit information: fundus photographs/fundus mailing list

variable.name: NAHBA1C
variable.description: B3. Visit information: hemoglobin A1c specimen mailing list

variable.name: NAOTHER
variable.description: B3. Visit information: other, specify

variable.name: NACONTAC
variable.description: B4. Visit information. Contact with or been contacted by EDIC clinic concerning his/her missed visit?

variable.name: NAREASON
variable.description: B4. Visit information. Has the patient been in contact with or been contacted by EDIC clinic concerning his/her missed visit?
variable.value: Patient refuses to undergo these examinations but is willing to undergo others
Moves to a less convenient location

variable.name: NAMISSED
variable.description: B5. Visit information. Missed procedures - completed later

variable.name: FSASDATE
variable.description: A4. Identifying information. Deidentified date form completed

variable.name: MASK_PAT
variable.description: A2. Identifying information. Deidentified patient ID

variable.name: NATARGET
variable.description: Deidentified target date for missed visit
